content.name: Sink channels_element
content.text: Accessor to update an element in the opened model

section.name: purpose
section.content:
Updating is done by sinking an xml-encoded element into the channels_element accessor. It then validates the updated element against its schema, deletes the element (the prior version), if any, with the same id as the updated element (the new version) and then the updated element is stored in the currently opened model.
If successful the response is a boolean indicating whether a prior version was removed, otherwise an exception is thrown.
Validation The schema URI held in the root attribute named schema of the updated element is used to validate the element. If the validation fails, an exception is raised. The schemas are located under /resources/schemas and must be in RelaxNG's XML format.
